title: Negro League Player George Wilson 1907 Manitowoc RPPC SGC 5 (SOLD)
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: Negro League Player George Wilson 1907 Manitowoc RPPC SGC 5 (SOLD)
posts.post_content:
$1275 (SOLD) net to me. Incredible condition for this one.

Wilson was an early Negro League pitcher who played for the Page Fence Giants 1895-1898, Columbia Giants 1899-1900 and Chicago Union Giants 1901-1905.

Nice card and really cool history.

Just read up on this and wow

Thanks Jeff - I agree.  :)

[quote name="mrreality68" post=2143628]Nice card and really cool history.

Just read up on this and wow[/QUOTE]
Great looking card.  Interesting it’s not a divided back as they started doing that late in 1906.

This is such a Wonderful card & honestly I'm really sorry that I miss'em!

It always seems to me that the kids back then had a look about them...
Ya know, like they were "Up to Somethin'"

What a Card...!!! & what a "MuG" on the kid :)
